reviews.review: Melhor jogo de todos os tempos
The best series of Cs.Very nice physic in game
det er et mege godt spil ;)
AWESOME when i was kid i played this in tournaments on us\eu servers was really fun doe specially with deagle ;)

According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.
Better than CSGO IMO. Fun game with heaps of active servers still around even after 13 years since it came out

El 1.6 remasterizado, el celoso de los cs, como quieran llamarlo este juego es increiblemente bueno, servidores activos, modos de juego, ping estable (mucho mejor que los del csgo :v) 9/10 por que no alcanzo a el 1.6 en sus espectativas sin embargo es un gran juego

Team killing for accidental friendly fire
Kids and adults rage-screaming over in-game voice chat
Porn sprayed everywhere
Headshots while shooting to the ground
Flashbangs everywhere (thrown by friend or foe - doesn't matter, the more the better)
Defusing without kit leading to bomb explosion while your teammate has one
Shooting at enemy with machine gun missing every single shot while being gutted by knife
Accusations of cheating on daily base
Russians insta kicked from servers

Great game, great memories.

Thank you guys, it was fun!

This game might be old, but it has a great community and when you play you feel like invited, The CSS community would explain every custom gamemodes to you step by step. the self gameplay of the game is also amazing i feel like the movement is amazing and sensetivity is 100% perfect, by that i mean airacceleration. i personally do think it was worth it to buy this game and im deffenetly spending more time on this game. It's the kind of a game that never gets old and you can enjoy as much as you want with friends. i hope this review was helpful :) Good luck and enjoy !
Other then the automatic lobbies in csgo this game is better in every way shape and form

Great game, a must buy if you are into gmod.

It is a very good game; I love the oldschool feelings and vibe.
Just got back into it after 4/5 years. Negative part is that there are almost NO pugs, mostly 32 and 64 servers or deathmatch. So unless you are willing to be patient to play a great game of oldschool cs then this is the game for you. Otherwise, I should save your money.
I got this game because it was the older version of counter strike, global offensive that is, I liked the fact that people still played this game but it took a little while to get used to everything.

The one time Valve made a really bad game.

I know CS:GO is the game everyone plays instead of this, but this is still worth getting. The main reason I bought was to get all the Gmod textures and materials. It enhances Gmod and allows you to play all the great TTT maps! As for the gameplay of Counter Strike: Source, it's not bad. It can be satisfying if you invest a bit of time into it. There are many empty servers, but its sometimes nice to play casually with a friend when there's nothing else to do. Plus, there are a few modded servers that are quite fun, especially the renowned Zombie Escape gamemode. This is definitely worth considering to add to your library if it's on sale.
